sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
When the Lord Jesus came to Jerusalem, he beheld the city, and wept over it, ... Simmonds, Martha.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
s.n., [London : 1655]
Title from opening lines of text. Signed at end: Martha Simmonds. Imprint from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 25. 1655. given about by ye Quakers". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
